string.original: While freeing Sonja from The Gloom, I missed Yvette, who kept a brave face against Faugrimms' Beasties! She is the one!
I don’t know how you can stand battling the Gloom Lord and his minions day in and day out. Me? I could use a dashing prince to help me get through it. Do you happen to know any?
It was TOTALLY boring in the Gloom. You're an absolute DOLL for rescuing me! We're gonna have a blast!
We have stuck together this long, you and I... Join me in my Adventure Club, and we will be ready to defeat Senor Shadow!
Could you help save my childhood home from the Gloom? It's out there somewhere, we just have to find it!
I've got it! I'll go into the family business. Everyone loves a good fortune teller, right?
I could use a little help, friend. No one was around to document some of my greatest exploits, for my memoirs, so, I have to do them again, care to join me?
Now that I know how bad the Beasties are, I think I should learn how to defend myself from them!
Quinn: The Traveling Bard
Okay
Oh an Inn, what a sight for sore eyes. I'm back my friend, and I come bearing a suprise!
This icky Gloom is getting everyone down, but I'm sure we can create happiness through the magic of FASHION!
Look! A note! What can a message from Daddy say? Where is he? Read the note so we can continue the search!
Oh, no! Looks like George is in trouble. We'd better check him and make sure he's okay!
I'm having a great time working in the Viking Mine, but it does get kind of lonely in there. Do you think anyone would come visit me while I work?
Poor George, mines really aren't my thing, but I'll give it a try if it will cheer him up.
My friend! I was just awakened from my afternoon nap by strange noises. Let us investigate!
Sugar, I feel inspired by my new home and new friends! I want to bake something special for everyone!
Kathleen: The Shepherdess
Okay
Hello, I am Kathleen. I was traveling on business for my family but got lost in this Gloom. Can I rest here?
Your kingdom doesn't have an Inn? Is this place up and coming or down and going? You should build one before you get anymore unexpected visitors.
Your Kingdom is great and all, but I'm so BORED! What's there to do around here?

Whew! Running a Kingdom can be a lot of work! If keeping up with food and buildings aren’t enough, there’s all your Subjects to take care of, too! Luckily you can use the fancy new Quest Manager to keep track of all of your Subjects’ stories.
Click on the Quest Manager
My Sweet Buns! Where did they go? I KNOW they were right here!
These are dark times friend, and we need to be ever vigilant! Join the Gloom Watch today!

A celebration of music, dancing, and art! Attend Art Faire parties to get Party Favors.

a Golden Goose

a Note from Yvette's Father
Note from Yvette's Father
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!
Reading Note...
Yvette: Note from father
Okay

Dearest Yvette - I hope this note finds you well. I can't reveal too much, but I've found something that could change everything. I've hidden it safely away. Do you remember the gift you'd leave for me every morning? Search there. -Love, Your Father
So exciting! Come find me and we can continue the search!
a Note from Yvette's Father
Note from Yvette's Father
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!
Reading Note...
Yvette: Note from father
Okay

Yvette - I found a magical portal in a large circle of stones. My curiosity got the better of me, and I ventured through it. I discovered a world rich with treasure, and I brought one back for you. Remember your favorite food for lunch? Think about it and you'll find a clue to the treasure.
I feel like we are getting close! Come find me and we can continue the search!
a Note
Note from Yvette's Father
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!
Reading Note...
Yvette: Note from father
Okay

Yvette, you only need to look a little bit more, I promise. But this one may be a bit harder for you. Be brave and overcome your fear, and you'll find the hidden treasure. In the meantime, be careful. I fear something dark crept out of the portal and into our world.
I am starting to get worried about my dad. Come find me and we can continue the search!
a Note
Note from Yvette's Father
A Mysterious Note: Click to Read!
Reading Note...
Yvette: Note from father
Okay

Yvette, I hope you're the one who found this. And I hope you are safe. I fear what dangers the portal may bring. A dark smoke has started to seep out of it - covering the land and forming strange creatures. Someone or something evil is behind this. Take this golden egg and sell it. Use the coins to get as far away from here as you can. I must find out what is behind this darkness and try to put a stop to it. For you, sweetheart.
My dad sure left a lot of notes... Come find me an we can see where this all leads!

Have {cnt1} Campfire to light the way out of the Gloom for the stranger.
Buy the Campfire from the Decoration tab in the Market.
Fish in the pond for {cnt2} Pails of Water... Just in case the fire gets out of control.
Fish to uncover the Pail and other items in the pond. It takes some time for the pond to restock.
For the safety of others, clear {cnt3} Rocks, Plants, Dead Trees or Stumps.
If you run out of things to clear, you can always buy them from the Market.
Walk to the Light
This Murky Mist, it has engulfed our stranger! Let us dispel the Gloom and light her way to freedom!
I've not seen a finer fire since I gave an imp a log bouquet. Yet still the lady is trapped in the Gloom!
Stranger in the Gloom: 1 of 10
{player} just found Sonja the Pirate!
This fierce pirate has some tales and booty to share.
She also has an extra Crystal Shard for you.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Find and Rescue the Mysterious Stranger and her House from the Gloom.
Rafael mentioned he last caught a glimpse of the Stranger and her House while standing on a Bridge by the River.
Sonja: The Gold Digger
Okay
Ahoy there, I'm Sonja! I guess I owe you one for saving me from the Gloom. If you help me find my lost Treasure Chests, I'll share my booty with you!
Oh ho! My friend, this day, it has just gotten a whole lot better. You know?
The Mysterious Stranger
It is time. Let us cut into the Gloom and bring home our beautiful, mysterious stranger! Ahem. How do I look?
You saved the stranger from the Gloom, but I'm afraid others will need your help. Senor Shadow wants this land!
Stranger in the Gloom: 10 of 10
{player} got sticky. The good kind of sticky.
{player} helped Rafael with his famous Hot Rock and Honey Massage.
The free Coins are only slightly sticky with honey.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {cnt1} Honey to help with the rub down.

Have {cnt2} Stones for Rafael's Hot Rock Massages.
Collect Stone from Mining Camps or mine rocks.

Ask Friends for Rolling Pins.

We have learned a valuable lesson. The lady is not hiding on a whim. This mysterious stranger has some business in the Gloom... or perhaps the Gloom has business with her! Let us double our efforts, friend!
Work the Kinks
If we cannot end her captivity in the Veil with light, we must lure the lady out. And few can resist my famous hot rock massage!
The stranger remains trapped in the murk! Ah well, you shall have the massage instead. No?
Stranger in the Gloom: 2 of 10
Wanted: The Dark Master and his Gloom Beasties!
{player} spread the word about The Dark Master and his minions of Gloom.

Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {cnt1} Love Letters to send to the trapped stranger.

Unwither 1 Crop in {cnt2} different Neighbors' Kingdoms.

Earn {cnt3} Reputation Hearts. You are limited to {cnt4} Reputation, so make sure you spend some too!
Visit Neighbors and do activities in the Kingdom to earn Reputation Hearts.
Spread the Word
It's true! The Gloom is a trap. Wax dummies don't lie. We must send courage to the imprisoned lady!
You spread word of the Gloom's perils? It is a creation of Senor Shadow, who turned day to night! Stay vigilant!
Stranger in the Gloom: 8 of 10
It just got real up in {kingdomName}!
{player} and Rafael did their part in the great Beastie purge. Will you do yours?
Here is some XP to help you on your way!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Consume this free Gloom Rat Potion, side effects may vary.
Beastie Potions are kept in your inventory, they will summon a Beastie. Other potions can be crafted in the Kitchen as well as purchased.
Have {cnt2} Animal Bones as proof of your heroism against Senor Shadow's Beasties.
Senor Shadow will summon Beasties when you perform activities, like clearing or harvesting, in your Kingdom.
Clobber {cnt3} Beastie in a Neighbor's Kingdom.
Click on Beasties to clobber them in a Neighbors Kingdom.
Fear and Loathing
Hmmm, if my Hot Rock Massage wouldn’t draw her out, the lady may fear Senor Shadow’s Beasties in the kingdom. Have at them!
Your might would astound Elmor the Unflappable, which I did only once! What is wrong with this lady?
Stranger in the Gloom: 3 of 10
{player} is warning other Kingdoms of the dangers of the Gloom!
Who else besides {player} will rescue those lost in the Gloom?
It's a risky job so take some free Coins.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {cnt1} Wood Logs to make wooden warning signs.
Chop trees to gather wood logs.
Use {cnt2} Super Chop from your Inventory and chop a tree.
Choose a tree with the most chops left to get the most out of your Super Chop!
Clear {cnt3} Tree Stumps from Neighboring Kingdoms to encourage them to put up signs and not stub toes.
Clearing Tree Stumps gives you more room to build!

I am certain that the lady is a product of the Gloom! But wait. What if I am wrong? It could happen twice. If we doom her to the inky fog, Rafael could not live with himself. Let us continue with the rescue, yes?
Warning Signs
The Grog, it did nothing! The image of the lady still haunts me! We must place signs, or others may join her, encased in the grim fog!
I'll build signs to warn others about the Gloom... and limit your liability if they still get lost!
Stranger in the Gloom: 6 of 10
{player} has their Grog goggles on.
{player} enjoyed some Bubbly Grog made from Ogre's Belch.
Don't worry about the calories. Cod pieces have a slimming effect.

Have {cnt1} Bubbly Grog to help drown out memories of the Lady.

Feed 1 Cow in {cnt3} different Neighbors' Kingdoms, you know, for fun.
Visit {cnt3} different Neighbors and Feed 1 Cow in each of their Kingdoms.
Momentary Distraction
I cannot sleep! Is the lady a trick of the Gloom meant to lure US in? We must distract ourselves!
Iss an excelente Grog! The Gloom shtranger can't distract uss from our cow's duty. I said duty. Cow's duty? Huh?

Send in the Dummy
Maybe the Gloom traps any who enter, including the lady. I will venture in to test it. Remember me!
Ah, yes, the old send-in-a-fake-version-of-yourself trick. A great way to save a marriage, too!

Animal Lover

I cared for the animals so much, they must be put on a diet! I fear I am worse than the Gloom.

Copy off their test and get some free Coins too!
Get Coins
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Make It Hail
Okay

The Courtyard is a special area of the castle that will help you earn more money from buildings that produce coins. The Courtyard is the cleared area in the middle of your kingdom that looks like dirt.
Build 1 Cottage to collect taxes from.
Purchase a Cottage from Buildings tab in the Market.
Move 1 taxable building onto the Courtyard.
Try moving one of your Cottages onto the Courtyard.
Tax a building on the Courtyard to get bonus Coins!
Click on a building on the Courtyard to tax it and get bonus coins.
Stay Grounded
Residents like to know that they're protected. If you put their homes on Courtyard, they'll be willing to pay more in taxes!
The Courtyard doesn't just have to be dirt. There are all kinds of styles to fit your royal taste.
A Little Something Extra: Quest 1 of 3
Laying the groundwork for a huge Kingdom!
{player} is building a bigger castle and earning some bonus with Courtyard!
Get some Courtyard and bring the bonus to your Kingdom!
Get Courtyard
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Purchase 3 pieces of Brick Courtyard.
There are different kinds of the Courtyard available in the Market. Go buy some!
Move 1 Maiden's Tower onto the Courtyard.
If you don't have a Maiden's Tower you can purchase it in the Market. If you have one, try moving it using Design Mode.
Tax {count3} buildings placed on the Courtyard
Tired of waiting? Why not build another Cottage to speed things up?
Keep this up, and you'll have plenty of Coins to grow your Kingdom. Just watch out for the Dark One's Thieves!
Throw It On The Ground
Having a hard time fitting all your buildings onto the Courtyard? Why not loosen the belt a bit by buying some more?
Nothing like some room to breathe. Don't relax too long though, there's still plenty of Gloom out there!
A Little Something Extra: Quest 2 of 3
The Dark One's forces are attacking - stop them before they spread the Gloom! Banish the invading beasties!
Look my friend! You have another message from our wayward wizard.
I've tolerated you and your puny Castle long enough! Now you'll learn what happens to those who challenge ME!
Alastair...so you're the one guiding this miserable upstart. My Beasties will destroy you both!
Moats are making {player} wet!
{player} is building a moat for their castle... No skinny-dipping!
Jump in and {player} will give you some free Coins.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
FAUGRIMM! He's the dark wizard I've been telling you about. He gains power through misery and wants to cover the world in Gloom!
Banish the {cnt1} Thieves.
Click on Thieves to Banish them.
Banish Faugrimm's {cnt2} Goblins.
Click on Goblins to Banish them.
Have {cnt3} Moat tiles to protect your Castle from more of Faugrimm's friends
Buy from the Water tab of the Nature section in the Market.
Staring down Evil
Now you can put a name and a face with all the Beastie presence and Gloom. With your help, we can put an end to Faugrimm!
Bravo! Hmm, that was easier than it probably should have been. Anyway, looks like those Thieves dropped something...
The Gloom Lord: 1 of 6
Feel free to look around! Click the House on your Neighbor Bar when you want to return home.
You'll need materials to complete the house. Click the X button on the top right for now.
Bubble, bubble {player} is cooking up trouble!
{player} is whipping up a magic brew!
Have a taste and get energized!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
My book! How did you...? No matter - you will NEVER break the curse laid upon it!
Have {cnt1} Chili Peppers, this has to be hot to melt his spell.
Click an Empty Farm Plot to plant Chili Peppers.
Have {cnt2} Eyes of Newt
Ask Friends for Eyes of Newt.
Explore to the Ancient Ritual Site to the East, I need to go there to do my spell.
The Ritual Site just to the East of where Alastair was first found. Exploring requires Exploration Crystals, which can be made at the Workshop.
My book! I'll deal with those wretched Thieves later...after I DRAIN your magic, Alastair!
Book of Sinister Schemes
Fate has smiled upon us with the discovery of Faugrimm's Book. Before I can read it, I will need some time and materials to break the binding spell he has on it.
You will need to be vigilant as I break the book's binding spell. Faugrimm will know I have it as soon as I begin, and I imagine he won't be happy! Not that he ever is...
The Gloom Lord: 2 of 6
{player} is so humble!
{player} is breaking an evil spell with a Spear of Humility!
Be humble too and get some free Energy!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Oh no, Alastair is trapped! We must free him! Maybe a Spear of Humility could pierce the Totem of Pride!
Craft {cnt1} Spear of Humility to smash the Totem of Pride.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have {cnt2} Royal Jewels to smash into the Spear tip.
Ask Friends for Royal Jewels.
Break the Totem of Pride try to free Alastair.
Craft the Spear of Humility and have all the required Jewels, then Click the Totem of Pride that is holding Alastair.
Save Alastair
The Dark One himself! This is too much for an old Duke. Break those totems to free poor Alastair - we need him now more than ever!
Alastair is one step closer to being free! Two more totems to go, I hope we can save him before it is too late!
The Gloom Lord: 3 of 6
{player} is sharpening their dagger!
{player} is one step closer to releasing their trapped subjects with their Dagger of Strength.
These free Stones will help you be sharp too!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Well done, my friend! Only 2 totems remain. For the Totem of Power, perhaps try a Dagger of Strength?
Craft {cnt1} Dagger of Strength to crack the Totem of Power.
This item can be crafted after you build a Workshop. Buy Crafting buildings in the Market.
Have {cnt2} Whetstones to sharpen the Dagger of Strength as much as possible.

Use the Dagger of Strength to crack the Totem of Power.
Craft the Dagger of Strength and have the required Whetstones, then Click the Totem of Power that is holding Alastair.
Save Alastair
I've always wondered what the Dark One looked like. Scary bloke! Poor Alastair is looking weaker by the moment. We need to get him free!
Bravo! He is almost free. Alastair, if you can hear me, hang on!
The Gloom Lord: 4 of 6
{player} is so loveable…
{player} is using a Bundle of Love Arrows to fight the forces of evil.
Defend your Kingdom against the Gloom with some Free Reputation.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
There's only one Totem left! Don't give up now!
Craft {cnt1} Bundle of Love Arrows to pierce the Totem of Hate.

Use the Love Arrows to Pierce the Totem of Hate and free Alastair!
After getting the Love Arrows and Love Letters, Click the Totem of Hate that is holding Alastair.
I am free! Well done - and thank you. Now, we shall settle this!
Arrgh! How did you defeat my curse? No matter. I will end this NOW!
Quickly, banish Faugrimm into the Gloom and take back your Kingdom!
Save Alastair
Oh! We are so close to freeing Alastair. Destroying that final totem is going to take an act of love!
Wonderful! Alastair is free! Now he can find out what secrets Faugrimm's book holds.

As your level increases, you'll unlock more crafting recipes to aid you in the fight against the Dark One!

{player} is using a sturdy club to banish some evil in CastleVille.

Quest rewards shared successfully!
Collect the Wood Club from the Workshop.

Use the Wood Club from your inventory to put the hurt on a Beastie.
Go to your Inventory and click on the Wood Club to activate it, then click on a Beastie to use it.
Banish 1 Beastie.
Use the Wood Club, and a few extra whacks if necessary, to Banish a Beastie.
With a bit of preparation, you can keep one step ahead of those blasted Beasties!
Knock Down Drag Out!
Beastie invasions can be a serious threat to your Kingdom. You would be wise to have a handful of weapons ready... just in case!
Excellent! Each weapon has limited use, so remember to keep extras on hand!
Make It Hail: Quest 2 of 2
{player} is going clubbing!
{player} is using a sturdy club to banish some evil in CastleVille.
Free Reputation will help you get clubbing too!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {items_count} {items,count}.
Get Silver Ore by mining rocks and collecting ore from a mine.
Sell {items_count} {items,count} from your inventory.
While in your inventory click on the Sell Button of an item to sell it.
Every coin helps in the fight against the Dark One!
Sell it All!
Taking on the Dark One isn't cheap! If you ever get low on Coins, you can sell items from your Inventory to earn more.
If fighting the Gloom Lord drains your coffers, selling is a great way to earn some quick Coins!
Selling Out: Quest 1 of 1
Local Legend
Okay
There is a local legend that says magical creatures live at the bottom of ponds and pools. They are known for collecting unusual items, especially useful ones, and hiding them in the depths.
Go fishing {count1} times to see what you can pull out of the pond!
Who knows what's lying at the bottom of your pond? Click on it to see what you can fish out!
Pull {items_count} {items,count} out of your pond by fishing in it.
string.variation: Pull {items_count} {items,plural} out of your pond by fishing in it.
Pull {items_count} {items,singular} out of your pond by fishing in it.

string.original: If you don't find a Gold Bar right away, don't get discouraged. Keep trying and you'll find one eventually!
You can also get the items you need from your subjects. Give them what they want, and they'll help you out, too!
Local Legend
Asking Friends is just one way to get items. Try fishing in the pond... you might pull up the thing you need most!
Fantastic! Who knows what kinds of things you can pull out of that enchanted pool.
Local Legend: Quest 1 of 1
Click on Yvette's house to tax it for Coins.
{player} banished evil from their Kingdom…
…For now. An epic battle such as this deserves some epic rewards.
Grab a Wood Club and banish the Gloom Beasties in your Kingdom.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Banish the evil Faugrimm back to his realm.
Click on Faugrimm to Banish him.
Amazing! To be able to hit Faugrimm, you must be special! He is gone…for now. Let me study the book for a while before we try open it again.
You've won this round…but this Kingdom will still be MINE!
Banish the Gloom Lord
You are the only one that can Banish Faugrimm. Do it now!
Why do I feel like he will be back…
The Gloom Lord: 6 of 6
It's Over 9000!
{player} just discovered how to grow their Kingdom bigger and faster!
Maybe they'll share one of their Wood Logs if you ask nicely.
Get Wood Logs
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have 1 Logging Camp in your Kingdom.
If you haven't built a Logging Camp yet you can find it in the Resources tab in the Buildings section of the Market.
Move a Logging Camp near some trees and see what happens!
If you already have a Logging Camp near some trees try finding a spot with more.
Harvest the Logging Camp {count3} times to see the time reduction in action!
The time reduction bonus has a max of 50%. A Logging Camp can only produce its resources twice as fast if it is near enough trees.
Lumbering Along
Did you know that other buildings can get bonuses based on where they are placed? Logging Camps produce logs faster if placed near trees.
Mining Camps work the same way as Logging Camps except with rocks. When you build a Mining Camp try placing it next to as many rocks as possible.

How!? But – this is impossible! You can’t banish ME! Oh, you’ll regret this!

Have {cnt1} fully crewed Barracks.
You can buy a Barracks in the Buildings Tab in the market. You must also crew it with your Neighbors.
Collect Taxes from your Barracks.

Have {cnt2} Workshop in your Kingdom.
Purchase a Workshop from the Buildings section of the Market.
A Call to Arms
Piercing further into the gloom will take great power. You will need to construct more buildings.
These buildings will provide you with the strength to fight the dark force behind the gloom. You are ready to explore further.

{player} saved Alastair from a terrible fate!

Quest rewards shared successfully!

Explore the Gloomy Area and rescue Alastair.
Select the new area with Alastair in it and disperse the Gloom.
Ah, thank you for finding me. In return, I will help you build a Kingdom that can free this land from the Gloom Lord. Let us begin.
A Daring Rescue
You are ready, seek me out and I will aid your fight against the Gloom!
The beasties are agents of an evil sorcerer who some refer to as The Gloom Lord. To rid your Kingdom of Gloom, you must stop him.

Momentary Distraction
I cannot sleep! Is the lady a trick of the Gloom meant to lure US in? We must distract ourselves!
Iss an excelente Grog *HIC* The Gloom shtranger can't distract uss from our cow's duty *HIC* I said duty *HIC* Cow's duty? Huh?

Got any luck to spare?

Cross your fingers and grab some Coins!

Flies to Honey
Do you know how to find a prince? I've heard that kissing frogs can work. Let's get it over with.
Yeeuck! Tastes like flies. But with that honey, it might catch on.

Fishing Trip

You found the note! Daddy must have a secret so big, he's afraid the Gloomy One will find out about it.

Okay

Rattus Gloomerus

Collect Coins {cnt3} times from Neighboring Kingdom's houses.

Too Sexy!
I once earned 1000 Coins at a bachelor auction. What can one do when the ladies love them so?
In this time of Gloom, love is harder and harder to find. It will be nice to get back to a routine.
Good Times: 1 of 5
{player} is adored by all their subjects!

Feed some grapes to someone you love! Do it!

A Decent Proposal
I have gotten so many marriage proposals over the years, they could fill the Great Library. In fact, I have resorted to changing my name several times.
Some ask: Is the man-blouse half open or half closed? - I prefer to live my life half open, my friend.
Good Times: 2 of 5
{player} and Rafael are panting heavily!
Obviously {player} and Rafael just got done chasing down a Gloom Wolf!
Keep running with some extra Energy!

Have {cnt1} Pails of Water to splash on Rafael after his run down.

Buy {cnt3} new Clothing Items to replace the Fair Maiden's now furry corset. That stuff is itchy.
Buy from the Clothes section of the Market.
Not In MY Kingdom!
I once chased a Gloom Wolf from here to the end of Dawnshire because he dared soil a fair maidens corset!
These Gloom Wolves, they run faster than they look. Especially when chased by the likes of me!

I once chopped down the mightiest tree in the forest with one chop - so as not to make the other gentlemen of the land feel inferior. It is not their fault.
After that, I have had enough wood to go around. You know, because that tree was so mighty. That is what I mean.

Little Bundle of Fire: 5 of 11
It's just child's play.
{player} is getting ready for their play date - with a baby Dragon!
You need a thick skin for playtime with a Dragon. Click to get some tough Cow Hide.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Use {ct1} Gloom Wolf Potions to summon some playthings for your baby!
Buy Gloom Wolf Potions in the Market, then use them from the Consumables tab of your Inventory.
Finish construction on the Torching Post.
Click on the Torching Post and use the required materials to build it.
Collect {ct3} Animal Bones. Dragons are born teething!
Banish Gloom Wolves and Gloom Rats to find Animal Bones.
Play Date
Raising a baby Dragon is hard work, but there's also room for play. Toothy, fiery play!
Playing with a baby Dragon is a little safer when you've got scales, but you'll do great!
Little Bundle of Fire: 6 of 11
The same old song and dance.
{player} is using the power of song to coax the baby Dragon out of its shell.
{player}'s baby already has a musical Reputation. Click to get some!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Did you hear that? Sounds like scratching coming from the Egg!
Goodness! It must be getting close to hatching!
Have {ct1} Bottles of Ink to write some sheet music.
Bottles of Ink can be crafted in the Studio.
Get singing lessons from Yvette! Tax her house {ct2} time.
Click on Yvette's House when it's ready to tax it.
Tend {ct3} Flowers. That's where songbirds live!
Click on a Flower to tend it.
Oh my goodness! It's time! The egg is getting ready to hatch! Remember - just keep breathing!
The Golden Child
Studies show playing music while your baby is in-Egg can make it smarter! Let's start our babies off on the right foot. Er, claw!
I'm not a doting mother if I say YOUR baby is going to be a little genius, right?
Little Bundle of Fire: 7 of 11
{player}'s a good egg!
{player} hatched a baby Dragon!
Jealous? It's not exactly a Dragon, but click to get a Chicken Egg!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Hatch the Dragon Egg. So exciting!
Click on the Dragon Egg and use the required materials to hatch it.
Harvest {ct2} Cabbage. Roughage is important in a growing baby!
Plant Cabbage in any empty Farm Plot.
Walking on Eggshells
This is it - Hatching Day! The day every parent remembers forever!
Isn't it just the most precious thing you've ever seen? The perfect play date for my baby!
Little Bundle of Fire: 8 of 11
All work and no play? No way!
{player} is learning to play with their baby Dragon!
{player} learned a LOT from hatching a baby Dragon and has knowledge to share. Click for XP!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
I've heard all Dragons have magic treasure hoards! But where do they keep them?
Let's just say we Dragons have a way of keeping things hidden.
Collect {ct1} Flint by mining Rocks in your Kingdom.
Click on Rocks to mine them for a chance to find Flint.
Click on the Dragon to give it Flint and play with it {ct2} times.
When you have Flint, click on your Dragon to play with it.
Your Dragon is in a playful mood now! For the next several minutes you can keep playing with your Dragon to perform playful actions and increase your Dragon's happiness!
Craft {ct3} Fireproof Chew Toy.
Fireproof Chew Toys can be crafted in the Studio.
Dragon Day Care
Playing with your baby Dragon makes it happy! And a happy Dragon will share a reward from its treasure hoard!
I've never seen such a happy baby Dragon! Ready to see that treasure hoard?
Little Bundle of Fire: 9 of 11
All that glitters....
{player}'s Dragon is sharing from its treasure hoard!
Click to get a Crystal Shard while you still can!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Click on the Regal Kennel to view the rewards baby Dragons give.
Use the Regal Kennel to view information about your pets' abilities or swap out other pets you own.
Give your Dragon {ct2} Fireproof Chew Toy to make your Dragon instantly happy.
Click on your Dragon to give it a Fireproof Chew Toy.
Select an item from your Dragon's Treasure Hoard.
When your Dragon's Happiness Meter is full, click on the Dragon to pick a reward from its Treasure Hoard.
Gold Digger
Fireproof Chew Toys make your Dragon instantly happy! And happy Dragons share their treasure.
The bond between Dragon and parent is a special one. I can't wait for my own Egg to hatch!
Little Bundle of Fire: 10 of 11
Braggin' about their Dragon.
{player}'s Dragon is trained and ready to play!
Want a little flame of your own? Click to get a Candle!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Give your baby Dragon another Fireproof Chew Toy.
Click on your Dragon to give it a Fireproof Chew Toy.
Select another item from your Dragon's Treasure Hoard.
When your Dragon's Happiness Meter is full, click on the Dragon to pick a reward from its Treasure Hoard.
Relax and fish in {ct3} Neighbors' Kingdoms while your baby Dragon is napping.
Click on a Neighbor in your Neighbor Bar and click on a pond in their Kingdom to fish.
Now that I've guided you through it, I'm feeling much more ready to hatch my own Egg!
I think it's time for mom and baby to get back to our own nest. Goodbye for now!
Worth Its Weight in Gold
I just love seeing a happy baby! Let's play with it again!
Just remember to keep your Dragon happy and your life will always be rich... with treasure AND love!
Little Bundle of Fire: 11 of 11
Renown: {p1} / {p2} Gloom Dragons Banished. Next reward: Click for Reward Details
Increase your Renown by banishing more Dragons!
Renown: {p1} / {p2} Gloom Dragons Banished. Next reward: Click for Reward Details
Your special skills are starting to reflect on my Renown! Keep up the great work!
Renown: {p1} / {p2} Gloom Dragons Banished. Next reward: Click for Reward Details
It's been a long time since anyone has been able to banish Dragons like you have!
{player} is gaining Renown!
{player} banished a Gloom Dragon and earned some Renown.
Grab some Grape Juice to celebrate!
Get Grape Juice
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Myrick's Flask is a really handy tool for banishing. As a youngster I had to rely on my bare hands and a cartload of rat meat to trap these guys.
Summon {ct1} Gloom Dragon. Best to handle them one at a time!
Craft a Gloom Dragon Potion in the Workshop.
Extinguish {ct2} Gloom Flames using Mystic Wind.
Craft Mystic Wind in the Beastie Lab and click on a Gloom Flame to put it out.
Fill the Renown Bar to earn your first rank in the Knight's Circle!
Activate Myrick's Flask to banish a Gloom Dragon.
A Knight's Trial
If you really want to increase your Renown, you’ll need to banish more than one Gloom Dragon!
You’re a natural banisher of Gloom Dragons. I haven’t seen someone with as much natural talent in dealing with these overgrown reptiles since… well… me.
A Knight's Tale: Quest 2 of 4
{player} has had it with all this Gloom!
{player} is investigating the Gloom.
Do some research on your own with an Alchemist Powder.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
There's nothing worse than being an uninspired genius. Well... except not being a genius at all. Maybe.
Use {cnt1} Beastie Potion to see one up close.
Use any beastie potion crafted in the Beastie Lab or bought from the market.
Buy {cnt2} Gloomed Rocks to study how Gloom could penitrate rock.
Buy Gloom Rocks from the market.
Visit {cnt3} Neighbors to investigate their fight against the gloom.
Click on the Neighbor Bar below to visit Neighbors.
Gloom Investigation
Being surrounded by Gloom really puts me off my painting. If I just knew more about it, I'm sure I could sort the murky muck out!
Interesting, interesting... well, not really. If we want to learn anything about the Gloom, simple observation is not enough!
Gloom Experiments: Quest 1 of 7
Things are heating up in {player}'s Kingdom!
Gloom Dragons are setting houses on fire!
Grab a Pail of Water to wash away that sulfur smell.
Get Pails of Water
Quest rewards shared successfully!
You've banished two Gloom Dragons. Of course, my all-time record for Gloom Dragon trapping is six, which probably is a lot more than you'd ever want to even bother with…
Get {ct1} Gloom Dragon Potions.
Craft a Gloom Dragon Potion in the Beastie Lab.
Collect {ct2} Dragon Sparks.
Summon Gloom Dragons and put out the Gloom Fires they start.
Fill the Renown Bar to earn your next rank!
Activate Myrick's Flask to banish a Gloom Dragon.
Passing the Torch
My personal record of 6 Gloom Dragons trapped is in real jeopardy! Be careful not to exhaust yourself!
You tied my record and are almost as famous as I am. Congratulations... My fame took years to amass and it took you... mere days. Bravo.
A Knight's Tale: Quest 3 of 4
{player} is pulling rank!
{player} has become a Renowned Knight of the realm!
Grab a Wood Club that {player} used during training.
Get Wood Club
Quest rewards shared successfully!
I just looked this up. My old nemesis, Bjorn of Uln, holds the all-time record of 13 Gloom Dragons trapped. We could break his record!
If we could break Bjorn's record I could even an old score I've had with him for years! I mean, WE could even the score. We... You.
Get {ct1} Mystic Winds so you can put out Gloom Flames.
Craft Mystic Wind in the Beastie Lab.
Fill the Renown Bar fully by banishing Gloom Dragons with Myrick's Flask.
Activate Myrick's Flask to banish a Gloom Dragon and fill the Renown Bar.
Put on your shiny new Mythium armor!
Click on the Avatar Customizer to change your character's outfit.
Getting Older
You have the chance to break Bjorn of Uln's all-time record for Gloom Dragons trapped. Achieve it and people will really, really like you!
You have banished 14 Gloom Dragons, thereby reducing Bjorn of Uln to a historical footnote! You are, truly, a Knight of great renown.
A Knight's Tale: Quest 4 of 4
{Player} is conducting weird science!
{player} is experimenting with the Gloom.
Take this Tulip in case this doesn't go well.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {cnt1} Gloom Samples.
Ask Friends for Gloom Samples.
Craft {cnt2} Gloom Elixirs.
Craft Gloom Elixirs in the Kitchen.
Use {cnt3} Gloom Elixirs on flowers... carefully.
Use a crafted Gloom Elixir from your Inventory then select a flower.
A Little Experiment
Observing the Gloom yielded no interesting findings, so it's time for experimentation. To the laboratory! Or wherever.
Now we're getting somewhere! With these results, we can begin to harness the power of the Gloom. For good, of course.
Gloom Experiments: Quest 2 of 7
{player} is banishing Gloom Dragons!
{player} hopes to impress Tom with this Knight skills.
Grab some free Stone just in case the Gloom Dragons get too close.
Get Stone
Quest rewards shared successfully!
A Gloom Dragon! Here is an opportunity to expand your horizons and be more than just a benevolent ruler of remarkable insight and grace. This is your chance to become a Knight!
There is one thing a Knight needs above everything else to be successful: Fame. In the business we call this Renown.
Banish 1 Gloom Dragon using Myrick's Flask.
Activate Myrick's Flask to banish a Gloom Dragon.
Get {ct3} Gloom Dragon Potion.
Craft a Gloom Dragon Potion in the Beastie Lab.
What I Do Best
Banishing Gloom Dragons will increase your Renown almost as quickly as Goblin tipping. Let's get started!
As you build Renown, you’ll discover that people will just… be nicer to you because you’re famous. It's fantastic!
A Knight's Tale: Quest 1 of 4
Feel free to look around!
Wouldn't it be fun to throw a spring party of our own? I just don't know where to start!
If you want to throw a party, I would love to show you how!
Don't blink!
{player} doesn't have time for sleep - there are inventions to be made!
Take a Candle. Just don't burn it at both ends.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Craft {cnt1} Vegetable Cocktails. This is no time to eat!
Craft Vegetable Cocktails in the Kitchen.
This might be the smartest thing I've ever invented. It's food and a drink all in one!
Have {cnt2} Parchment to revise the design.
Parchment can be crafted in the Studio.
Have {cnt3} Dragon Torches so you can work all night.
Craft Dragon Torches in the Workshop, once you have a Royal Kennel in your kingdom.
Can you believe that a Dragon Torch will generate 1.21 gigawatts... right before buring out?
Up all Night
This Gloom research is far too exciting to stop for trivial things like food and sleep. I've got to keep working!
Thanks for the supplies. Now I can work through the night on my designs. Anything could happen!
Gloom Experiments: Quest 3 of 7
Now THAT'S a fire!
{player}'s invention blew up in their face.
Have some Pails of Water nearby, just in case.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {ct1} Iron Bars to make parts.
Craft Iron Bars in the Workshop once you have a Blacksmith.
Have {cnt2} Flaxseed Oil to keep the machine lubricated.
Craft Flaxseed Oil in a Kitchen.
Place and build Giovanni's Gloom Slurper machine.
Find the Gloom Slurper in your Inventory, place it in your Kingdom and gather the required parts to build it.
Design Realized
Eureka! My anti-Gloom machine is almost ready. What does it do, you ask? How am I supposed to know - it hasn't been turned on yet!
Explosions! That's how you know you're on the right track.
Gloom Experiments: Quest 4 of 7
{Player}'s invention has gone all wibbly-wobbly.
But it will work this time. Really.
Take some Rope to help out with the repairs.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Tax {cnt1} houses to raise more funds for this important project.
Click on Houses to tax them.
Craft {cnt2} Wood Planks to build some scaffolding.
Craft Wood Planks in the Workshop.
Have {ct3} Bag of Nails make the improvements.
Craft a Bag of Nails in the the Workshop once you have a Blacksmith.
Sometimes it is easier to build things right the first time... but that's not nearly as fun.
New Direction
Ok, ok, so the Gloom Slurper malfunctioned and then exploded. Modifications, that's what we'll need!
Now we can begin modifying the Gloom Slurper! This time, without the explosions. Probably.
Gloom Experiments: Quest 5 of 7
Genius is 99 percent perspiration...
Inventing something new can be hard work.
Enjoy a drink while {player} works hard.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Craft {cnt1} Hammers make the improvements.
Craft Hammers in the Workshop once you have a Blacksmith.
Have {ct2} Gold Bricks to hammer into sheets.
Have {cnt3} Anvil to bend the metal on.
Craft Anvils in the the Workshop.
Now I can reverse the polarity on the probic vent! That should do the trick...
Inventing is Hard Work
A few tweaks here, a smack or two there, and this machine will just about be ready. You know, to do anti-Gloom stuff.
The Gloom Slurper modifications are almost complete! I love it when a plan comes together.
Gloom Experiments: Quest 6 of 7
{player} is fighting Gloom with Gloom!
{player} is converting the Gloom into Crystal Shards. Brilliant!
Take a Crystal Shard to begin your own exploration.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {cnt1} Gloom Extract to fuel the machine.
Ask Friends for Gloom Extract.
Finish the Gloom Converter.
Complete the building of the now named Gloom Converter.
Collect from the Gloom Converter {cnt3} times.
Click the Gloom Converter to collect from it.
Gloom Converter
Now that the modifications are done, it's so obvious! We weren't building a Gloom Slurper... we were building a Gloom Converter!
Using the Gloom to dispel the Gloom - even for me, that's brilliant!
Gloom Experiments: Quest 7 of 7
Eureka!
{player} is practicing the scientific method with Alastair.
Get some Alchemist Powder to join in on the science!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
I have been sensing something strange lately. I am drawn to it, yet repelled.
It may be my new cologne, Eau Du Beast. It brings out the animal in the women!
No, it is not your olfactory medley, my overly-amorous friend. It is something else - something magical!
Feed {count1} animals to see if they are the source of Alastair's intuitions.
Click on ready animals to feed them in your Kingdom or a Neighbor's.
Tend {count2} flower to see if something may be hiding amongst it.
Click on flowers to tend them in your Kingdom or a Neighbor's.
Have {count3} Stones to help ground Alastair in case he is having a nervous breakdown.
Stone can be found by mining rocks and collecting from Mining Camps.
To the north lies the Dragon Cave. I sense that the magical vibrations I'm feeling are coming from there!
But you just said whatever was vibrating was right here?
I have triangulated my intuition. I now believe that whatever magical anomaly I am sensing is emanating from...
The Dragon Cave!
Sense and Sensibility
We must find what is causing the magical vibrations I am sensing. Check your Kingdom for magical anomalies.
Clearly whatever I am sensing is not in your Kingdom. We must search to the north!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 1 of 9
Alastair, Alastair, he's our man!
If he can't help {player} find Mythium, no one can!
Help them find Mythium and get some XP!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Explore the area North of your Kingdom in search of the Dragon Cave.
You must have Exploration Crystals, Coins and specific Castle Levels to explore.
Go fishing {count2} time to get food for your journey.
Click on ponds to go fishing.
Tax {count3} houses to help pay for the increased Kingdom infrastructure expansion demands.
Click on ready houses in your Kingdom to tax them.
Amythite is unlike any other substance in the known world. It bonds things together magically.
By bond, you mean like the Amythite freezes the thing that is stuck in it?
Exactly, my rugged friend. Amythite freezes whatever is stuck in it.
And the best part? Amythite contains Mythium! Mythium: the essence of all things Mythological. We have found a field filled with magical power!
Northward Bound
We must expand your Kingdom to the north. Eventually we will gain access to the magically powerful Dragon Cave!
Your new northern expansion is filled with wondrous delights! These strange rocks? They are pure Amythite! Amazing!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 2 of 9
Through the Gloom
{player} and Alastair are making their way to the Abandoned Dragon Cave.
Get a Crystal Shard and fight off the Gloom along with them!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Have {count1} Jeweled Goblets to distract Gloom Dragons in case one shows up.
Ask your Friends for Jeweled Goblets.
Craft {count2} Rifting Scepter.
Rifting Scepters can be crafted in the Studio.
Remove {count3} Amythite Rock to clear your path to the Dragon Cave.
Click on Amythite Rocks to remove them using Rifting Scepters.
There seems to be an interesting and strange machine here. Be careful! We have no idea what it may be!
There's a sign on it: Faugrimm's Amythite Rifting Scepter Parts Machine. Patent Pending.
Interesting. Apparently Faugrimm also knew the power of these fields and built his own Rifting Scepters.
Rifting Scepters
We must separate the Mythium from the Amythite. Conveniently, I recently developed some experimental Rifting Scepters. Build some.
These Amythite fields seem to have been formed by the magic of the Dragon Cave! I bet there is some deeper connection to be discovered!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 3 of 9
An Unwelcome Visitor
Faugrimm tried to stop {player} from getting the Abandoned Dragon Cave.
But {player} will prevail! Get some Energy to join in on the fight.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Move Faugrimm's Scepter Parts Machine to a new location to work on repairing it.
Objects can be moved using Design Mode.
Visit {count2} Neighbor to tell them of your discovery.
Click on a Neighbor's portrait at the bottom of the screen to visit them.
Have {count3} Iron Bar to start fixing up Faugrimm's Scepter Parts Machine.
Iron Bars can be crafted in the Workshop.
How Convenient
If we can fix Faugrimm's Amythite Rifting Scepter Parts Machine, we may be able to harvest Mythium from the Amythite fields even faster!
Repairing Faugrimm's Amythite Rifting Scepter Parts Machine may prove time consuming. We must press on!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 4 of 9
{player} has struck Mythium!
And now they're making their way to the Dragon Cave.
Get some energy to join {player} on their journey.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Craft {count1} Rifting Scepters to collect more Mythium.
Rifting Scepters can be crafted in the Studio.
Explore the area with the Dragon Cave to reveal its secrets.
You must have Exploration Crystals, Coins and specific Castle Levels to explore.
Have {count3} Wheelbarrows ready to haul away Dragon Cave treasures.
Get Wheelbarrows by asking Friends.
Piteous fools! You thought I would just let you waltz on over to the Dragon Cave unhindered? Do you think I am stupid?
Wait. Don't answer that. YOU are stupid for thinking you could get to the Dragon Cave!
NO ONE shall access its immense power and wealth. Feel my wrath!
Into the Gloom
You are so close to the Dragon Cave! It is time we explored it for ourselves!
We have done it... We can finally explore the mysteries within the Dragon Cave!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 5 of 9
Feel free to look around! Click the House on your Neighbor Bar when you want to return home.
Forward Motion
{player} pushed further into the Gloom to get to the Dragon Cave!
Get a Candle to light the way.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Clear {count1} Amythite Rocks from the mouth of the Dragon Cave.
Craft Rifting Scepters to clear Amythite Rocks from your Kingdom.
Remove {count2} Amythite Trees to clear the Cave's entrance.
Craft Rifting Scepters to clear Amythite Trees from your Kingdom.
Craft {count3} Hammers to help smash anything else in your way.
Hammers can be crafted in the Workshop after you have a Blacksmith.
So… brilliant. In order to search the cave you must use Mythium to access its magic. It is almost as if this was pre-ordained. Destiny now!
We will need Mythium to explore the Dragon Cave and access the treasures within!
Bump In The Road
If Faugrimm doesn't want us getting to the Dragon Cave, it must hold unspeakable power and riches! We must press on.
We are now ready to explore the Dragon Cave! I have not been this excited since the Night of the Six Wands!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 6 of 9
Nearing the Finish Line
{player} is so close to the Dragon Cave, they can taste it.
For something that tastes better than the Dragon Cave, here's some Eggs.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Click the Dragon Cave to search it.
Click the Dragon Cave in your Kingdom to search it.
Collect {count2} Mythium to continue to explore the Dragon Cave.
Extract Mythium from Amythite Rocks using Rifting Scepters.
Explore the Dragon Cave {count3} times to uncover its hidden treasures.
Open one of the 9 treasure chests to reveal hidden treasures in the Dragon Cave.
To keep exploring the Dragon Cave, we should finish our work on Faugrimm's Amythite Rifting Scepter Parts Machine.
That machine can help us in our quest to generate Mythium - the very currency the Dragon Cave requires!
You seem pretty excited by this Dragon Cave.
Magical Dragon Caves are kind of my thing.
Shrouded In Mystery
Collect and use Mythium to search the Dragon Cave and unveil its unparalleled secrets!
Incredible! The Dragon Cave is like nothing I have seen before. It seems to have unlimited bounty!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 7 of 9
It All Paid Off
{player} made it to the Dragon Cave at last!
Get some Reputation in honor of {player}'s achievement!
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Further search the Dragon Cave {count1} times to see what riches lie within.
Craft Rifting Scepters in the Studio to extract Mythium from Amythite Rocks.
Craft {count2} Candles to light the construction area.
Candles can be crafted in the Studio after you have a Tailor.
Finish fixing up Faugrimm's Scepter Parts Machine.
Collect the necessary buildable items to construct Faugrimm's Scepter Parts Machine.
Into the Depths
We must keep exploring the Dragon Cave. To do this, we must make Rifting Scepters and use them on Amythite objects.
The Dragon Cave is an endless source of wealth and resources! It is no wonder Faugrimm didn't want us to discover it!
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 8 of 9
{player} is looking for items to make Extraction Scepters.
It's a good thing {player} fixed up the Amber Locator!
Get a pail of water to help {player} cool off after all the hard work.
Quest rewards shared successfully!
Use Faugrimm's Scepter Parts Machine {count1} times to find Rifting Scepter parts.
Click Faugrimm's Scepter Parts Machine when it's ready to find Amber and other useful items.
Find {count2} decorations in the Dragon Cave.
Click on the Dragon Cave to search it.
Rescue {count3} animals from the depths of the Dragon Cave.
Click the Dragon Cave to search for treasure inside it.
Curses! You managed to make it inside the Dragon Cave! That makes me really, really, really mad.
We don't care if you're mad, you insane maniac! We're too busy enjoying the lavish riches of the Dragon Cave!
Oh, really? Well, let me remind you that I set the bar when it comes to creativity and evilness! And I’m a hard worker!
You will rue the day you took the Dragon Cave from me!
Riches Galore
Who knows how much treasure this Dragon Cave holds? I suppose there is only one way to find out!
Given that the Dragon Cave is infinite, we should probably continue our search to see what else we can discover.
Abandoned Dragon Cave: Quest 9 of 9

Feel free to look around!
Ooh, how beautiful! And not at all terrifying!

Welcome to CastleVille!
Welcome to CastleVille! I'm the Duke, your royal advisor and Neighbor. This Kingdom has been neglected for far too long. A new ruler is just what we need!
Your Majesty! Thank the stars you're here. A mysterious GLOOM is scaring away your SUBJECTS!
The GLOOM has spread throughout your land. Take a look for yourself!
You found SONJA's ARROWHEAD! She must be nearby...
You will need to find loyal SUBJECTS to help rebuild your KINGDOM and dispel the GLOOM.
A mighty strike! Those STARS give you EXPERIENCE (XP). Collect enough of those XP stars to LEVEL UP!
Huzzah! You have enough XP to LEVEL UP! When you LEVEL UP, you gain ENERGY to do more actions and unlock new items and abilities.
Oh no, not a GLOOM WOLF! Someone must save that poor girl!
Look at that LOOT! You should COLLECT those items. You might need them later.
Marvelous, your Highness! The GLOOM WOLF dropped one of SONJA'S ARROWHEADS. I wager she'd be HAPPY to have it back.
She tried to open the MAGICAL KEEP? No one has been able to do that since your father disappeared. Are you going to try?
You can also get more QUESTS from me. Look for the QUEST icon on the LEFT.
Royal coin purse a little light? Collecting taxes from HOUSES in your KINGDOM will get you some COINS!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby!
You opened the MAGIC KEEP!? You truly are the HERO we have been waiting for! You'll make a great RULER. I would like to join your KINGDOM and aid your ADVENTURE!
You will need a strong CASTLE to dispel the GLOOM. Let's build a GREAT HALL raise your CASTLE LEVEL and find ALASTAIR!
Richard, the jester, has gone missing. He entered the gloom in search of Sonja, and no one has seen him since. Can you find him?
QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time. I'll give you one to start.
The list on the LEFT will display your current QUESTS. Click the ICONS to check a QUEST's requirements and your current progress.
This QUEST has two parts. First, let's collect some STONE from these rocks.
Now we can gather WOOD from a nearby TREE by clicking it.
Well played! You completed your first QUEST. Click the ICON for your reward.
That was fun right? Look for more quests from me and others. SONJA has one too.
SONJA has joined your KINGDOM and brought some HAPPINESS with her! HAPPIER KINGDOMS provide more rewards. Your HAPPINESS is shown on the lower LEFT.
Completing QUESTS for your SUBJECTS is another way to gain HAPPINESS and increase rewards. Exclamation marks mean that QUESTS are available.
Giving GIFTs to your KINGDOM's residents also increases HAPPINESS. Beloved Rulers check back frequently to keep their people HAPPY.
DECORATIONS make the people in your KINGDOM happy. More rewards for you! Huzzah!
Excellent work! Continue growing your KINGDOM by purchasing more land.

Zounds! I knew you could open your father's KEEP! Unfortunately, it looks like the KEEP is in need of REPAIR. I've just given you a QUEST to repair it. QUESTS are special tasks people will give you from time to time.
A magnificent Great Hall, your Majesty! Now you may name your KINGDOM!
Looks like you're running low on ENERGY. You have a few ITEMS in your INVENTORY that will restore ENERGY and allow you to continue building your KINGDOM.
Should you continue to run low on ENERGY, more ENERGY ITEMS may be purchased in the MARKET.
The more farm plots you have, the more CROPS your subjects can enjoy. Empty plots may be purchased from the BUILDING tab in the Market.
Crops planted near WATER grow faster because they're irrigated! Move your Empty FARM Plots near the POND and harvest some Wheat.
COINS let you buy items and buildings. That means HAPPY subjects and a growing KINGDOM. Collect TAXES from HOUSES to earn COINS.
Now you have enough COINS to start growing your KINGDOM!
Collect MATERIALS from this building and others like it to save ENERGY.
Your residents want GRAPES! You will need to PURCHASE an EMPTY FARM PLOT from the MARKET before you can get planting.
When you plant CROPS near WATER, they become irrigated and grow FASTER!
Huzzah! You've gained enough HAPPINESS to start building your CASTLE!
Now with your KEEP built, we can start to push back The GLOOM! But first you must collect enough COINS to EXPLORE.
Excellent, you have enough COINS. Let's EXPLORE!
That's WIZARD ALASTAIR'S satchel! Oh, thank the stars, he must be nearby! Check the SATCHEL for clues.
Thank you for FREEING me! Can you also HELP me SEARCH for my lost ARROWHEAD? It's around here somewhere.
Upon my word, another GLOOM WOLF! Can you BANISH it?

Ah, but where are my manners? I'm the Duke, and I rule a neighboring Kingdom.
We've fallen on some hard times here, but I have a feeling that you can help us!
How would you like to make this Kingdom yours?

I'm afraid your new lands are surrounded by magical murk, and most of your subjects are lost in it... but don't fret! Building a Castle will allow you to dispel the Gloom and rescue your people!
You can start by saving my friend Rafael, who got lost nearby.

We haven't been properly introduced. I'm Yvette!
I was lost in the Gloom for such a long time. Now that I'm here, I'd really like to stay in your Kingdom!

Hi there! I was sent by the Fairy Kingdom to find out if you're friendly and help you out if you're not a big meanie.
I guess since you helped me you're okay - not like those horrible Goblins who stole my wings!
Oh yeah, my name is Sylphie by the way.

Ho-Ho-Hello! Thank you for your help. I have many nicknames, but anyone who saves me from crashing can call me by my real name, Kris Kringle!
Once a year, I travel the lands to deliver presents. My Yulefest cheer repels the Dark One's Gloom - and it seems old Faugrimm isn't happy about it!

Wow, you showed that G-g-gloom Yeti! I'd sh-shake your hand, but I'm a lit-t-ttle motion challenged at the moment.
M-my name is George. It's n-n-nice to meet-t you!. Would you mind hel-l-lping me get out-t-t of this problem I've f-f-found myself in?

I'm Hazel, the Ice Witch of the North!
My frosty magic will chill you to the bone... and then my Yetis will finish you off! Hahahahaha!

I may seem like I've got a heart of ice, but all I really want is to be loved - by Faugrimm!
Sorry for all the Yeti attacks... and the ice storm... no hard feelings, right?
Mystery Character
Use COINS and EXPLORE here to see who this is.

Adding Royal Councilors gives you more Neighbors to visit and share requests! Royal Councilors aren't your Facebook Friends. Other CastleVille players may see your Name, Profile Picture, and how often you play CastleVille. They may be able to see your social network ID number. If the box below is unchecked, you will not be recommended as a Royal Councilor to other CastleVille players. It may take up to 72 hours to completely remove you from the Royal Council system.
COUNT ME IN!

What are Royal Councilors?

Royal Councilors are chosen from other CastleVille players based on factors like game level and gameplay characteristics. If you choose to add Royal Councilors, they can accept your invitation and will become CastleVille neighbors just like any you may already have. Royal Councilors will not be added as your Facebook friend.
Can Royal Councilors see my private information?

Royal Councilors can see each other's profile picture, first name and last initial, and information about how frequently they play CastleVille. They cannot see each other's personal information or access each other's Facebook profiles.
What if I don't want to be part of Royal Councilors?

You may opt out of Royal Councilors at any time by unselecting the box below. If you opt out of Royal Councilors, you will not be shown to other CastleVille players as one of their recommended Royal Councilors. You will lose any Royal Councilors you have previously added.
GO

Play CastleVille!
By providing us with these permissions we will help you and your friends connect and provide you with the latest news about the game.
Access My Basic Information
Our primary use of your basic information, such as your name and photo, as well as your friends list is to enable you to see and play with your friends in our game.
Send Me Email

We use your email address to send you alerts on things like gifts, neighbor invitations and occasionally info on new features, games and special offers, including free virtual cash. You can change your preferences at any time. Learn more here.
Post To My Wall
We provide fun ways for you to share posts and rewards with friends on Facebook. We don't post without your permission.
Access My Profile Information
We need to know your birthday to ensure you recieve age-appropriate content.
Publish Games And App Activity
CastleVille may publish scores, achievements, and other activity to Facebook.

Dear Friends,

Spring has always been one of my favorite seasons. I look forward every year to the blooming flowers, adorable baby animals, and, of course, exciting egg hunts! This year, I am pleased to bring my love of springtime to the whimsical world of CastleVille.
I invite you to join me in my Kingdom to celebrate the season. We'll make delicious dishes, craft delightful decorations, and throw elegant Spring parties for our closest Friends.
It's a good thing!
